publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1974 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Housing (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that amendments at Stage 3 of the Housing (Scotland) Bill be disposed of by reference to the following order of consideration: sections in the order in which they arise in the Bill, each schedule after the sections which introduce it, and the long title last. Supported by: Euan Robson*
